bibl.title: The Jews in Hellenistic and Roman Egypt. The Struggle for Equal Rights.

series.title: Texte und Studien zum Antiken Judentum.

bibl.seg: Kasher Aryeh, The Jews in Hellenistic and Roman Egypt. The Struggle for Equal Rights. (Texte und Studien zum Antiken Judentum. 7.)
Tübingen, J.C.B. Mohr (P. Siebeck), 1985, 8°, xviii-424 pp., 4 plans, 3 cartes, 14 fac-sim.

C.R. par Pierre-Maurice Bogaert, RThL 18 (1987) pp. 82-83. - Klaus Bringmann, HZ 248 (1989) pp. 669-671. - Hans G. Kippenberg, JSJ 17 (1986) pp. 255-257. - André Paul, RSR 76 (1988) pp. 61-62. - G.L. Prato, Gregorianum 67 (1986) pp. 361-362. - Jacques Schwartz, BibO 44 (1987) col. 160. - John J. Collins, SCent 6 (1987-1988) pp. 55-57. - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 36 (1990) pp. 86-87.
